alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 2:41PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Jackson, northeastern Bay, western Calhoun and southeastern Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 315 PM EDT/215 PM CDT/... At 241 PM EDT/141 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles west of Blountstown, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marianna, Alford, Moose Pond, Fountain, Singer Road, Bayou George, Union City, Camps Head, Bennett, Youngstown, Star, Kinard, Chipola Park, Majette, Compass Lake, Nixon, Betts, Kynesville, Ridgetop and Chason. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Jackson; Washington
